snippet: The Eastern Municipal Water District of California yesterday initially priced about $100.7 million in water and sewer revenue refunding certificates of participation through underwriters led by Paine Webber Inc.   The maximum yield on the issue wa...
lead_paragraph: The Eastern Municipal Water District of California yesterday initially priced about $100.7 million in water and sewer revenue refunding certificates of participation through underwriters led by Paine Webber Inc. The maximum yield on the issue was 6.848 percent for securities due in 2020. Another long maturity offers a yield of 6.803 percent for certificates due in 2009.
